intro.title: SonicHealer Introduction
intro.description: SonicHealer uses sound energy to activate meridian flow in your body, clear blockages, and eliminate negative energy, helping to relieve or eliminate physical ailments.

sound_therapy.title: Sound Energy Therapy
sound_therapy.description: We don't use traditional music rhythms or specific frequencies to stimulate nerves. Instead, we use unique sound energy that directly acts on your meridians, promoting qi and blood circulation to achieve physical and mental balance.

music_selection.title: Diverse Music Selection
music_selection.description: You can freely choose your favorite music styles combined with our sound energy function. No matter which country you're from or what your preferences are, you'll find the most suitable healing method.

infrasound.title: Infrasound Option
infrasound.description: This is a frequency beyond human hearing. When our program releases healing energy, it won't disturb people around you and is suitable for helping with insomnia at night.

hearing_impaired.title: Accessible for Hearing Impaired
hearing_impaired.description: Since the energy released by our program directly stimulates the body's meridians, it doesn't need to be processed through the ears and brain to perceive the melody.

steps.register: Register your email to get 100 minutes of free trial.
steps.select_music: Choose your favorite music with our sound energy function.
steps.enjoy: Enjoy the physical and mental relaxation brought by sound energy.

best_practices.title: For Best Results:
best_practices.headphones: You can listen to energy music with headphones.
best_practices.speaker: Or point your phone's speaker towards the affected area to direct sound wave energy.

basic.title: Basic Plan
basic.description: Purchase 100 minutes of playtime (Valid for 3 years)

referral.title: User Development Program
referral.intro: SonicHealer invites all users to participate in the co-development program, creating sustainable passive income through the referral mechanism and achieving long-term wealth growth.

first_level.title: First Level
first_level.description: After successfully referring a new user, you will receive 20% of their consumption amount as a reward.

second_level.title: Second Level
second_level.description: When the user you referred refers new members, you will receive 10% of their consumption amount as a reward.

win_win.title: Win-Win Model
win_win.description: This program allows each participant to accumulate wealth by expanding their network. As the referral network grows, your earnings will gradually increase. If your referrals actively participate and develop the referral mechanism, your income will be even more substantial.
win_win.commitment: SonicHealer is committed to building a sustainable and steady growth cooperation mechanism, allowing every participant to achieve long-term personal wealth accumulation while sharing the results.

simulation.title: Income Simulation Case
simulation.case_title: Mr. A's income forecast with 3 new referrals per month
simulation.assumption1: • Mr. A refers 3 new users each month
simulation.assumption3: • Each referrer also refers 3 new members
simulation.result_description: After continuously referring for 6 months, monthly income can reach $7,650, with a cumulative total income of $12,330. This demonstrates the income growth potential brought by the expansion of the referral network!

start.title: Get Started
start.subtitle: Download SonicHealer now and start your health journey!
start.description: Choose your preferred platform to download and enjoy 100 minutes of free trial:
start.notice1: This application is for relaxation purposes only. If you have serious physical or mental illnesses, please seek professional medical assistance.
start.notice2: The principle of this application is sound energy regulating meridians, which is based on Chinese medicine theory and may not be recognized by Western medicine. Please use your own judgment.

about.title: About
about.description: SonicHealer is created by Hong Kong True Health Company, aiming to provide the simplest and fastest energy audio transmission to alleviate the suffering of those in need.
